page.title: 06Wareham Employment.
page.content: Wareham Job Centre is run by Mr.Imms. He manages both Wareham and Swanage Job Centres.Dorset's main office is in Poole.Its provides a service to residents,but in the summer helps many from other areas.Wareham has the highest amount of jobs,except in summer when Swanage employs many part time people,to cater for the large number of tourists.The main group of jobs that aren't filled are part time jobs,because people looking for jobs, want a steady wage.In the Job Centre they have an average of 3-4 jobs filled a day.Most people who have just left school don't use the Job Centre but are reffered to the town careers. The main jobs that people in the area get are industrial jobs and trades, clerical,retail and catering jobs. Con'td on Pg 7
